name: Chocolate makes you happy: Halloween
description: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, fires, ghosts, Jack-O'-Lantern's and explosions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel or AMD 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any
